## hasError() function

Gets indication whether controls have errors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasError(form: NgForm, controls: string[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | NgForm | Form containing controls |
|  controls | string\[\] | Array of controls names to be checked for errors |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
